CS232
Class SkylineViewer

java.lang.Object
  CS232.SkylineViewer

public class SkylineViewer
extends java.lang.Object

The SkylineViewer class provides a visual representation of both the buildings (inputs to a skyline computation) and the skyline (output of a skyline computation).

The format for the input is that each object in the ArrayList is a valid building, but that the buildings are not necessarily in any order.

The format for the output is that the Points are in strictly increasing order of x-coordinate. The interpretation is that the skyline starts at height zero and proceeds horizontally to the next point's x-value and then turns vertically towards that points y-value. The skyline continues horizontally from the last point to the edge of the window.

Version:
8 January 2005; modified 17 January 2008 to use parameterized lists
Author:
dlevine
